tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Athletes (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50),
    sport VARCHAR(50),
    fitness_goal VARCHAR(50),
    availability VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id),
    workout_date DATE,
    workout_time TIME,
    duration INT
);
CREATE TABLE athlete (athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_name STRING, sport STRING, fitness_goal STRING, availability STRING);
CREATE TABLE workout_schedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id INT, schedule_date DATE, workout_type STRING, duration_minutes INT);
CREATE TABLE coach (coach_id INT PRIMARY KEY, coach_name STRING, sport STRING);

CREATE TABLE Athletes (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sport VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    fitness_goal VARCHAR(50),
    availability VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE WorkoutSchedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT NOT NULL,
    workout_date DATE,
    workout_time TIME,
    workout_duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id)
);

CREATE TABLE athlete (
    athlete_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sport VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    fitness_goal VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    availability BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE workout_schedule (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id UUID REFERENCES athlete(athlete_id) NOT NULL,
    workout_date DATE NOT NULL,
    workout_time TIME NOT NULL,
    workout_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_workout (
    athlete_id UUID REFERENCES athlete(athlete_id) NOT NULL,
    schedule_id SERIAL REFERENCES workout_schedule(schedule_id) NOT NULL,
    exercise_id SERIAL REFERENCES exercise(exercise_id) NOT NULL,
    sets INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reps INTEGER NOT NULL
);
